scripts.dev: concurrently -p '[{index}]-[{time}]' -t HH:mm:ss "gnome-terminal --tab -- ngrok http 8080" "wrangler dev --test-scheduled" "sleep 5 && npm run devWebhook"
scripts.devWebhook: curl -s http://localhost:4040/api/tunnels/ | jq -r '.tunnels[0].public_url' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'BOT_TOKEN=$(cat ./.dev.vars | grep -o 'BOT_TOKEN=[^[:space:]]*' | cut -d '=' -f 2); curl -X GET https://api.telegram.org/bot${BOT_TOKEN}/setWebhook?url={}' | { cat; echo; }
scripts.deployWebhook: grep -E '^(BOT_TOKEN|DEPLOY_URI)=' ./.dev.vars | awk -F= '/^BOT_TOKEN=/{bot_token=$2} /^DEPLOY_URI=/{deploy_uri=$2} END{printf "https://api.telegram.org/bot%s/setWebhook?url=%s", bot_token, deploy_uri}' | xargs -I {} curl -X GET {} | { cat; echo; }
